alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 8:24PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Blizzard Conditions Likely For Portions of Saint Lawrence County... As of 815 PM, a band of heavy snow was developing across the Saint Lawrence Valley. The combination of this heavy snow along with strong southwest winds gusting 35 to 45 mph will produce blizzard conditions, including visibility below one quarter mile at times. Southern portions of the Saint Lawrence Valley have the best chances of seeing blizzard conditions, including but not limited to locations such as Gouverneur, Hammond, and Heuvelton. Travel will be very difficult to near impossible in the snow band. Persons are urged to avoid any unnecessary travel this evening.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
